handler

Class Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • handler.Handler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteHandler, GetHandler, HeadHandler, OptionsHandler, ParametersHandler, PatchHandler, PostHandler, PutHandler

    public abstract class Handler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler is abstract base class for all request handlers which help to generate appropriate response for each request.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Younjin Hwang

      • isHandledVerb

        public boolean isHandledVerb(Request request)
        Checks handledVerbs if there is httpVerb for request.
        Parameters:
        request - the object that made with client input at socket
        Returns:
        true if handledVerbs contains httpVerb of request; false otherwise
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        Request.getHttpVerb()

      • isHandledPathSegment

        public boolean isHandledPathSegment(Request request)
        Checks handledPathSegments if there is pathSegment for request.
        Parameters:
        request - the object that made with client input at socket
        Returns:
        true if handledPathSegment contains pathSegment of request; false otherwise
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        Request, containsPathSegment(Request, String)

      • canHandles

        public boolean canHandles(Request request)
        Check both isHandledVerb and isHandledPathSegment are true.
        Parameters:
        request - the object that made with client input at socket
        Returns:
        true if isHandledVerb return value and isHandledPathSegment return value are both true; false otherwise
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        Request, isHandledVerb(Request), isHandledPathSegment(Request)
